# ChatGptResponseExtensions.GetContent method

Gets the content of the first choice, if available.

```csharp
public static string? GetContent(this ChatGptResponse response)
```

## Return Value

The content of the first choice, if available.

## Remarks

When using streaming responses, this method returns a partial message delta.
